sources.title: Hollywood Cavalcade (1939)
sources.description: Buster Keaton, Malcolm St. Clair, Alice Faye, Don Ameche, J. Edward Bromberg

metadata.Plot: Michael Linnett Connors takes Molly Adair from Broadway understudy to 1913 Hollywood star. Although she is in love with him, she marries her co-star reckoning wrongly Connors thinks of her only in terms of movies. He fires her in pique, apparently terminally damaging his career.
metadata.Director: Irving Cummings, Buster Keaton, Malcolm St. Clair
metadata.Writer: Ernest Pascal, Hilary Lynn, Brown Holmes
metadata.Actors: Alice Faye, Don Ameche, J. Edward Bromberg
